addressleaf.section:
To
e right honorable S
r
Robert Cecyll Knight of her Hig
es
privy Councel

25 Maij
1595
M
r
Bodley to my M
r

page.lettertext:
fol.193r
May it please yo
r
H. to morowe to
appoint me any houre to repaire unto
yo
w
, and I will give my attendance.
For though my health be not suche, as is
ready for
e voiage, I will be very
willing, to knowe her
Ma
ties
pleasure, and
I will streine my self to all that I finde
my self able: wherein hoping
at yo
r
H.
will procure me fr
o
her Ma
tie
a more
gratious returne, then I have had a
welcome home, w
ch
I will alwaies ac-
knowledge for a singular favo
r
,
I take
my humble leave.
Yo
r
H. humble at c
o
maundem
t
Tho. Bodley.
